posts.post_content: I run this and rampaging baloths in a landfall/token deck. Harrow, Khalni Heart Expedtion, Oracle of Mul Daya. The endgame is usually this + beastmaster ascension, swing with many 9/9 beasties and many more 6/6 birdies. Possible names for this deck "The Birds and the Beasts"..."Birdie and the Beast"...

posts.post_content:
Well there are actually no real rules that tell how an angel has to look like. I for my part like the artwork, that's angel enough for me.  
Also, "not too expensive" is understated - it's a 3/3 flyer for four mana with an awesome ability!  
It's only double-white colored too, and i'd play it over [Luminous Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Luminous Angel) most of the time.

posts.post_content:
I dont have one yet, so this is only my impression of it...  
  
it is a 3/3 flyer for 4, on its own, that is alright, lightning bolt will kill it fast, but as with the sheperd, there is so much removal that 8 outta 10 times it will be hit with doomblade and you the lightning bolt  
  
overall, I say it is good, in a format where there is 100 diferent removal spells, this is weak to 101 different spells  
  
edit: I LOVE THE ARTWORK, awesome blue wings and who cares about the thong, why are you even looking perv
